settings.label: Welcome content
settings.default:
This is a demonstration page for how you can use your online store to better take care of your Kickstarter/Indiegogo backers. Both this pop-up and following page are customizable to allow you to maintain your brand’s authentic voice as well as control which items are shown to specific backer groups.

By using Crowd Control, you can place a page like this one on your website for backers to confirm reward details (color, size, etc), purchase additional items, provide shipping info, then pay for any new items or pledge deficiencies. Our approach to pledge management helps you take control of your business by improving the experience for both you and your new customers. Get backers what they want faster, increase revenue, and utilize your momentum from crowdfunding to keep business moving in the right direction.

Say hello to real business solutions for getting the most out crowdfunding. We’re glad you came.
